title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When attempting to use the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When entering the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter field, an error message is displayed instead of filtering the data based on the specified date.
EB: When entering the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter field, the table should filter the data and display only the rows that have a date equal to or later than 3/2/2005.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, you can follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table.
3. Configure a filter on the table using the datetime column.
4. In the 'value1' field of the filter configuration, enter the value new Date("3/2/2005").
5. Observe the error message that is thrown instead of the table filtering the data based on the specified date.
